Plot: The life of Bettie Page, a 1950s pin-up model and one of the first sex icons in America, who became the target of a Senate investigation due to her risqué bondage photos.
Title: The Notorious Bettie Page
Actors: Gretchen Mol, Chris Bauer, Jared Harris, Sarah Paulson
tomatoConsensus: This biopic only skims the surface of Bettie Page's life, leaving her as a cipher, and additionally fails to place her iconic status in historical context.
